Author: five_days_underwater
Text: This is how I am too, as long as I can resist eating for about half an hour after smoking, then the munchies will go away

Author: sp00py13
Text: I’ve found that as long as I don’t START eating, then I don’t do the whole munchies binge thing. That being said, if I eat anything, even “just a bite,” I’m in full-on binge mode for the rest of the night. I try to keep the urges at bay by drowning myself in 0 calorie liquids. Going for a walk or distracting yourself with some sort of hobby is really fun while stoned too, and it has the added bonus of keeping you from eating :)
